title: All American Kids' Dinosaur 3-Piece Twin Sheet Set with Pillow Case | Matching Comforter Set & Curtain Set Available!
features: 1 standard twin fitted sheet (39" x 75" x 14")
description: Turn your child's bedroom into Dinosaur Central with this colorful twin sheet set. This standard twin sheet set fits mattresses up to 14 inches thick and is designed to coordinate beautifully with our dinosaur-themed comforter sets and curtain sets. Kids love the bright red, green and blue color scheme that brings all of their favorite dinosaurs to life to inspire their imagination, while parents are pleased with their durability. The twin set comes with a fitted sheet, flat sheet and matching pillow case. All linens are made of 100% Polyester and are machine washable — perfect for even your youngest family member.
